7 template<class Tx, class Tad>
8 BoundaryConditionFreestream<Tx, Tad>::BoundaryConditionFreestream(std::string val_name, std::shared_ptr<Mesh<Tx, Tad>> mesh, std::shared_ptr<Config<Tx>> config, std::shared_ptr<FluidModel<Tx, Tad>> val_fluid_model,
9  size_t val_face, size_t val_start, size_t val_end): BoundaryCondition<Tx, Tad>(){
10  fluid_model = val_fluid_model;
11  name = val_name;
12  face = val_face;
13  start = val_start;
14  end = val_end;
15  rho_inf = config->freestream->rho_inf;
16  u_inf = config->freestream->u_inf;
17  v_inf = config->freestream->v_inf;
18  p_inf = config->freestream->p_inf;
19  ni = mesh->ni;
20  nj = mesh->nj;
21  nic = ni - 1;
22  njc = nj - 1;
23 };

25 template<class Tx, class Tad>
26 void BoundaryConditionFreestream<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
27  size_t iend, jend;
28  if(face == global_bottom || face == global_top){
29  if(face == global_bottom)
30  jend = 0;
31  else
32  jend = njc + 1;
33 
34 #pragma omp parallel for
35  for(size_t i=start; i<=end; i++){
36  rho[i][jend] = rho_inf;
37  u[i][jend] = u_inf;
38  v[i][jend] = v_inf;
39  p[i][jend] = p_inf;
40  T[i][jend] = fluid_model->get_T_prho(p[i][jend], rho[i][jend]);
41  }
42  }
43 
44  if(face == global_left || face == global_right){
45  if(face == global_left)
46  iend = 0;
47  else
48  iend = nic + 1;
49 
50 #pragma omp parallel for
51  for(size_t j=start; j<=end; j++){
52  rho[iend][j] = rho_inf;
53  u[iend][j] = u_inf;
54  v[iend][j] = v_inf;
55  p[iend][j] = p_inf;
56  T[iend][j] = fluid_model->get_T_prho(p[iend][j], rho[iend][j]);
57  }
58  }
59 
60 };

77 template<class Tx, class Tad>
78 void BoundaryConditionInviscidWall<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
79  size_t iend, jend;
80  if(face == global_bottom || face == global_top){
81  if(face == global_bottom)
82  jend = 0;
83  else
84  jend = njc + 1;
85 
86 #pragma omp parallel for
87  for(size_t i=start; i<=end; i++){
88  Tad un, ds;
89  if(jend == 0) {
90  auto nx = mesh->normal_eta[i-1][jend][0];
91  auto ny = mesh->normal_eta[i-1][jend][1];
92 
93  ds = nx*nx + ny*ny;
94  p[i][jend] = 1.5*p[i][1] - 0.5*p[i][2];
95  rho[i][jend] = 1.5*rho[i][1] - 0.5*rho[i][2];
96  un = u[i][1]*nx + v[i][1]*ny;
97  u[i][jend] = u[i][1] - 2.0*un*nx/ds;
98  v[i][jend] = v[i][1] - 2.0*un*ny/ds;
99  T[i][jend] = fluid_model->get_T_prho(p[i][jend], rho[i][jend]);
100  }
101  else{
102  auto nx = mesh->normal_eta[i-1][jend-1][0];
103  auto ny = mesh->normal_eta[i-1][jend-1][1];
104 
105  ds = nx*nx + ny*ny;
106  p[i][jend] = 1.5*p[i][njc] - 0.5*p[i][njc-1];
107  rho[i][jend] = 1.5*rho[i][njc] - 0.5*rho[i][njc-1];
108  un = u[i][njc]*nx + v[i][njc]*ny;
109  u[i][jend] = u[i][njc] - 2.0*un*nx/ds;
110  v[i][jend] = v[i][njc] - 2.0*un*ny/ds;
111  T[i][jend] = fluid_model->get_T_prho(p[i][jend], rho[i][jend]);
112  }
113  }
114  }
115 
116  if(face == global_left || face == global_right){
117  if(face == global_left)
118  iend = 0;
119  else
120  iend = nic + 1;
121 
122 #pragma omp parallel for
123  for(size_t j=start; j<=end; j++){
124  spdlog::get("console")->critical("Boundary condition not implemented!");
125  }
126  }
127 
128 };
129

149 template<class Tx, class Tad>
150 void BoundaryConditionAdiabaticWall<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
151  size_t iend, jend;
152  if(face == global_bottom || face == global_top){
153  if(face == global_bottom)
154  jend = 0;
155  else
156  jend = njc + 1;
157 
158 #pragma omp parallel for
159  for(size_t i=start; i<=end; i++){
160  if(face == global_bottom){
161  T[i][jend] = 1.5*T[i][1] - 0.5*T[i][2];
162  rho[i][jend] = 1.5*rho[i][1] - 0.5*rho[i][2];
163  u[i][jend] = 2.0*u_bc - (1.5*u[i][1] - 0.5*u[i][2]);
164  v[i][jend] = 2.0*v_bc - (1.5*v[i][1] - 0.5*v[i][2]);
165  p[i][jend] = fluid_model->get_p_rhoT(rho[i][jend], T[i][jend]);
166  }
167  else{
168  T[i][jend] = 1.5*T[i][njc] - 0.5*T[i][njc-1];
169  rho[i][jend] = 1.5*rho[i][njc] - 0.5*rho[i][njc-1];
170  u[i][jend] = 2.0*u_bc - (1.5*u[i][njc] - 0.5*u[i][njc-1]);
171  v[i][jend] = 2.0*v_bc - (1.5*v[i][njc] - 0.5*v[i][njc-1]);
172  p[i][jend] = fluid_model->get_p_rhoT(rho[i][jend], T[i][jend]);
173  }
174  }
175  }
176 
177  if(face == global_left || face == global_right){
178  if(face == global_left)
179  iend = 0;
180  else
181  iend = nic + 1;
182 
183 #pragma omp parallel for
184 
185  for(size_t j=start; j<=end; j++){
186  if(face == global_left){
187  T[iend][j] = 1.5*T[1][j] - 0.5*T[2][j];
188  rho[iend][j] = 1.5*rho[1][j] - 0.5*rho[2][j];
189  u[iend][j] = 2.0*u_bc - (1.5*u[1][j] - 0.5*u[2][j]);
190  v[iend][j] = 2.0*v_bc - (1.5*v[1][j] - 0.5*v[2][j]);
191  p[iend][j] = fluid_model->get_p_rhoT(rho[iend][j], T[iend][j]);
192  }
193  else{
194  T[iend][j] = 1.5*T[nic][j] - 0.5*T[nic-1][j];
195  rho[iend][j] = 1.5*rho[nic][j] - 0.5*rho[nic-1][j];
196  u[iend][j] = 2.0*u_bc - (1.5*u[nic][j] - 0.5*u[nic-1][j]);
197  v[iend][j] = 2.0*v_bc - (1.5*v[nic][j] - 0.5*v[nic-1][j]);
198  p[iend][j] = fluid_model->get_p_rhoT(rho[iend][j], T[iend][j]);
199  }
200 
201  }
202  }
203 
204 };
205

223 template<class Tx, class Tad>
224 void BoundaryConditionWake<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
225  size_t iend, jend;
226  if(face == global_bottom || face == global_top){
227  if(face == global_bottom)
228  jend = 0;
229  else
230  jend = njc + 1;
231 
232 #pragma omp parallel for
233  for(size_t i=start; i<=end; i++){
234  rho[i][jend] = rho[nic+1-i][1];
235  u[i][jend] = u[nic+1-i][1];
236  v[i][jend] = v[nic+1-i][1];
237  p[i][jend] = p[nic+1-i][1];
238  T[i][jend] = T[nic+1-i][1];
239  }
240 
241 #pragma omp parallel for
242  for(size_t i=start; i<=end; i++){
243  rho[nic+1-i][jend] = rho[i][1];
244  u[nic+1-i][jend] = u[i][1];
245  v[nic+1-i][jend] = v[i][1];
246  p[nic+1-i][jend] = p[i][1];
247  T[nic+1-i][jend] = T[i][1];
248  }
249  }
250 
251  if(face == global_left || face == global_right){
252  if(face == global_left)
253  iend = 0;
254  else
255  iend = nic + 1;
256 
257 #pragma omp parallel for
258  for(size_t j=start; j<=end; j++){
259  spdlog::get("console")->critical("Boundary condition not implemented!");
260  }
261  }

283 template<class Tx, class Tad>
284 void BoundaryConditionOutflow<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
285  size_t iend, jend;
286  if(face == global_bottom || face == global_top){
287  if(face == global_bottom)
288  jend = 0;
289  else
290  jend = njc + 1;
291 
292  spdlog::get("console")->critical("Boundary not implemented!");
293  }
294 
295  if(face == global_left || face == global_right){
296  if(face == global_left)
297  iend = 0;
298  else
299  iend = nic + 1;
300 
301 #pragma omp parallel for
302  for(size_t j=start; j<=end; j++){
303  rho[iend][j] = rho[iend-1][j];
304  u[iend][j] = u[iend-1][j];
305  v[iend][j] = v[iend-1][j];
306  p[iend][j] = p_inf;
307  T[iend][j] = fluid_model->get_T_prho(p[iend][j], rho[iend][j]);
308  }

328 template<class Tx, class Tad>
329 void BoundaryConditionPeriodic<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
330  size_t iend, jend;
331  if(face == global_bottom || face == global_top){
332 #pragma omp parallel for
333  for(size_t i=start; i<=end; i++){
334  rho[i][0] = rho[i][njc];
335  u[i][0] = u[i][njc];
336  v[i][0] = v[i][njc];
337  p[i][0] = p[i][njc];
338  T[i][0] = T[i][njc];
339 
340  rho[i][njc+1] = rho[i][1];
341  u[i][njc+1] = u[i][1];
342  v[i][njc+1] = v[i][1];
343  p[i][njc+1] = p[i][1];
344  T[i][njc+1] = T[i][1];
345  }
346  }
347 
348  if(face == global_left || face == global_right){
349 #pragma omp parallel for
350  for(size_t j=start; j<=end; j++){
351  rho[0][j] = rho[nic][j];
352  u[0][j] = u[nic][j];
353  v[0][j] = v[nic][j];
354  p[0][j] = p[nic][j];
355  T[0][j] = T[nic][j];
356 
357  rho[nic+1][j] = rho[1][j];
358  u[nic+1][j] = u[1][j];
359  v[nic+1][j] = v[1][j];
360  p[nic+1][j] = p[1][j];
361  T[nic+1][j] = T[1][j];
362  }
363  }
364 
365 };

387 template<class Tx, class Tad>
388 void BoundaryConditionIsothermalWall<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
389  size_t iend, jend;
390  if(face == global_bottom || face == global_top){
391  if(face == global_bottom)
392  jend = 0;
393  else
394  jend = njc + 1;
395 
396 #pragma omp parallel for
397  for(size_t i=start; i<=end; i++){
398  if(face == global_bottom){
399  p[i][jend] = 1.5*p[i][1] - 0.5*p[i][2];
400  u[i][jend] = 2.0*u_bc - (1.5*u[i][1] - 0.5*u[i][2]);
401  v[i][jend] = 2.0*v_bc - (1.5*v[i][1] - 0.5*v[i][2]);
402  T[i][jend] = T_bc;
403  rho[i][jend] = fluid_model->get_rho_pT(p[i][jend], T[i][jend]);
404  }
405  else{
406  p[i][jend] = 1.5*p[i][njc] - 0.5*p[i][njc-1];
407  u[i][jend] = 2.0*u_bc - (1.5*u[i][njc] - 0.5*u[i][njc-1]);
408  v[i][jend] = 2.0*v_bc - (1.5*v[i][njc] - 0.5*v[i][njc-1]);
409  T[i][jend] = T_bc;
410  rho[i][jend] = fluid_model->get_rho_pT(p[i][jend], T[i][jend]);
411  }
412  }
413  }
414 
415  if(face == global_left || face == global_right){
416  if(face == global_left)
417  iend = 0;
418  else
419  iend = nic + 1;
420 
421 #pragma omp parallel for
422  for(size_t j=start; j<=end; j++){
423  spdlog::get("console")->critical("Boundary condition not implemented!");
424  }
425  }
426 
427 };

429 template<class Tx, class Tad>
430 void BoundaryContainer<Tx, Tad>::apply(Array2D<Tad>& rho, Array2D<Tad>& u, Array2D<Tad>& v, Array2D<Tad>& p, Array2D<Tad>& T){
431  for(auto&& bc : boundary_conditions)
432  bc->apply(rho, u, v, p, T);
433 };
434 
435 template<class Tx, class Tad>
436 size_t BoundaryContainer<Tx, Tad>::get_index(int idx, size_t face){
437  if(idx >= 0){
438  return idx;
439  }
440  else{
441  if(face == global_bottom){
442  return nic + 2 + idx;
443  }
444  else if(face == global_right){
445  return njc + 2 + idx;
446  }
447  else if(face == global_top){
448  return nic + 2 + idx;
449  }
450  else if(face == global_left){
451  return njc + 2 + idx;
452  }
453  else{
454  spdlog::get("console")->critical("something went wrong!");
455  }
456  }
457 };
458 
459 template<class Tx, class Tad>
460 BoundaryContainer<Tx, Tad>::~BoundaryContainer(){
461  for(auto&& bc : boundary_conditions)
462  delete bc;
463 };
464 template<class Tx, class Tad>
465 BoundaryContainer<Tx, Tad>::BoundaryContainer(std::string filename, std::shared_ptr<Mesh<Tx, Tad>> mesh, std::shared_ptr<Config<Tx>> val_config, std::shared_ptr<FluidModel<Tx, Tad>> val_fluid_model){
466  ni = mesh->ni;
467  nj = mesh->nj;
468  nic = ni - 1;
469  njc = nj - 1;
470  auto config = cpptoml::parse_file(filename);
471  auto bcs = config->get_table_array("boundary");
472  for (const auto& bc : *bcs){
473  std::string name = bc->get_qualified_as<std::string>("name").value_or("boundary");
474  std::string type = bc->get_qualified_as<std::string>("type").value_or("");
475  std::string face = bc->get_qualified_as<std::string>("face").value_or("");
476  size_t start = bc->get_qualified_as<int64_t>("start").value_or(0);
477  size_t end = bc->get_qualified_as<int64_t>("end").value_or(0);
478 
479  size_t facei;
480  if(face=="left") facei = global_left;
481  if(face=="right") facei = global_right;
482  if(face=="bottom") facei = global_bottom;
483  if(face=="top") facei = global_top;
484  end = get_index(end, facei);
485 
486  auto u_bc = bc->get_qualified_as<double>("u").value_or(0.0);
487  auto v_bc = bc->get_qualified_as<double>("v").value_or(0.0);
488  auto T_bc = bc->get_qualified_as<double>("T").value_or(0.0);
489 
490  //auto c = config->config;
491  //spdlog::get("console")->debug("{}", c);
492  //auto tmp_inf = c->get_qualified_as<double>("freestream.rho_inf").value_or(1.0);
493 
494  if(type == "freestream"){
495  auto boundarycondition = new BoundaryConditionFreestream<Tx, Tad>(name, mesh, val_config, val_fluid_model, facei, start, end);
496  boundary_conditions.push_back(boundarycondition);
497  }
498  else if(type=="outflow"){
499  auto boundarycondition = new BoundaryConditionOutflow<Tx, Tad>(name, mesh, val_config, val_fluid_model, facei, start, end);
500  boundary_conditions.push_back(boundarycondition);
501  }
502  else if(type=="periodic"){
503  auto boundarycondition = new BoundaryConditionPeriodic<Tx, Tad>(name, mesh, val_config, val_fluid_model, facei, start, end);
504  boundary_conditions.push_back(boundarycondition);
505  }
506  else if(type == "slipwall"){
507  auto boundarycondition = new BoundaryConditionInviscidWall<Tx, Tad>(name, mesh, val_config, val_fluid_model, facei, start, end);
508  boundary_conditions.push_back(boundarycondition);
509  }
510  else if(type == "wall"){
511  auto boundarycondition = new BoundaryConditionAdiabaticWall<Tx, Tad>(name, mesh, val_config, val_fluid_model, facei, start, end, u_bc, v_bc);
512  boundary_conditions.push_back(boundarycondition);
513  }
514  else if(type == "isothermalwall"){
515  auto boundarycondition = new BoundaryConditionIsothermalWall<Tx, Tad>(name, mesh, val_config, val_fluid_model, facei, start, end, u_bc, v_bc, T_bc);
516  boundary_conditions.push_back(boundarycondition);
517  }
518  else if(type == "wake"){
519  auto boundarycondition = new BoundaryConditionWake<Tx, Tad>(name, mesh, val_config, val_fluid_model, facei, start, end);
520  boundary_conditions.push_back(boundarycondition);
521  }
522  else{
523  spdlog::get("console")->info("Wrong type of BC.");
524  }
525  }
526 }
527 
528 #if defined(ENABLE_ADOLC)
529 template class BoundaryContainer<double,adouble>;
530 template class BoundaryCondition<double,adouble>;
531 template class BoundaryConditionFreestream<double,adouble>;
532 template class BoundaryConditionOutflow<double,adouble>;
533 template class BoundaryConditionPeriodic<double,adouble>;
534 template class BoundaryConditionInviscidWall<double,adouble>;
535 template class BoundaryConditionAdiabaticWall<double,adouble>;
536 template class BoundaryConditionIsothermalWall<double,adouble>;
537 template class BoundaryConditionWake<double,adouble>;
538 #else
539 template class BoundaryContainer<double,double>;
540 template class BoundaryCondition<double,double>;
541 template class BoundaryConditionFreestream<double,double>;
542 template class BoundaryConditionOutflow<double,double>;
543 template class BoundaryConditionPeriodic<double,double>;
544 template class BoundaryConditionInviscidWall<double,double>;
545 template class BoundaryConditionAdiabaticWall<double,double>;
546 template class BoundaryConditionIsothermalWall<double,double>;
547 template class BoundaryConditionWake<double,double>;
548

558 #endif
